comments:
* DTP 1.0 RC2 12/19 build *
* Apache Derby 10.1 Embedded *

1. Create an new Apache Derby embedded cp
2. Connect, right context to "Save Offline"
3. Disconnect
4. Right context to "Work Offline"

Several errors logged, but it seems to load the offline cache:

Hey Brian,

Can you take a look at this?  I don't know if this is still a problem.  From the stack trace, it looks like the connection profile persistence is blowing up.

One thing to look at is not saving if the only property that changed was the connection state.

Thanks in advance,
Rob
Hey John... I am not able to reproduce this with the latest code... Can you try it again and see if you still get the error?

Yep, still broken in 2/22 build. Note that my Derby db has a synonym defined, which might be the difference.
